LOGIC SOUNDLAB AP520 5.25" 2-Way Coaxial Car Speakers – High Power, Clear Sound

Upgrade your car audio with the LOGIC SOUNDLAB AP520 5.25" 2-way coaxial speakers. Designed for superior sound clarity and durability, these speakers provide deep bass, clear highs, and balanced midrange frequencies for an exceptional in-car audio experience. Perfect for replacing factory speakers or upgrading your setup.

Key Features

✅ Powerful Performance – Handles 60W RMS / 120W peak power for rich, dynamic audio.

✅ Premium Materials – Poly mica woofer cone with foam surround for enhanced sound quality and longevity.

✅ Clear Highs – 1” Mylar dome tweeter ensures smooth and detailed treble.

✅ Clear High - 1" Mylar dome tweeter delivers smooth and extended frequency response.

✅ Optimized Sound - High-temperature 1" voice coil and 15 oz. / 30 oz. magnet for deep, dynamic audio.

✅ Easy Installation - Compact 1.73" (44mm) mounting depth for hassle-free setup.

Technical Specification:

  • Model: AP520
  • Speaker Size: 5.25"
  • Design: 2-Way Coaxial
  • Tweeter Type: 1” Mylar Dome
  • Voice Coil: 1” High Temperature
  • Impedance: 4 Ohms
  • Cone Material: Poly Mica
  • Surround Material: Foam
  • RMS Power: 60W per speaker
  • Peak Power: 120W per speaker
  • Frequency Response: 100 Hz – 18 kHz
  • Sensitivity: 89 dB
  • Mounting Depth: 1.77” (45mm)
  • Sold as a Pair
Why Choose LOGIC SOUNDLAB AP520?

Experience enhanced clarity and powerful sound with the LOGIC SOUNDLAB AP520. These speakers are built to perform, delivering premium sound reproduction that makes every drive more enjoyable

LOGIC SOUNDLAB

Logic Soundlab blends modern aesthetics with cutting-edge tech, crafting speakers that are both visually striking and acoustically superior. Our designs feature sleek lines and elegant curves, housed in robust metal frames for lasting durability. Each speaker is a testament to our pursuit of excellence and meticulous attention to detail. Logic Soundlab is dedicated to delivering an audio experience that is as luxurious as it is precise, ensuring every detail enhances both beauty and functionality.
